property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: The runtime framework for executing MapReduce jobs. Can be one of local, classic or yarn.

property.name: yarn.sharedcache.enabled
mapreduce.job.sharedcache.mode
property.description: A comma delimited list of resource categories to submit to the shared cache. The valid categories are: jobjar, libjars, files, archives. If "disabled" is specified then the job submission code will not use the shared cache.
